short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to see when the next marvel movie is coming out so they can get hyped!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's super simple! Just download this extension, and you're all set. Click on the icon that pops up and you'll be able to see how far every MCU movie that has a release date is! You can also see the latest trailers, if there are any out. This way, you can keep checking and get hyped!
